actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1861(e)(4) of the Social Security Act to clarify a condition of participation applicable to hospitals under such title.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require hospitals to place their Medicare patients under the care of a physician, rather than requiring that they place all their patients under such care.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1861(e)(4) of the Social Security Act to clarify a condition of participation applicable to hospitals under such title.
